title: Navaratna Emerald & Pearl Haaram with Peacock Pendant
features: This stunning Haaram features a double-stranded design of lustrous freshwater pearls interspersed with vibrant natural emerald beads. The centerpiece is a beautifully crafted peacock pendant (Mayura Padakam) adorned with sparkling CZ diamonds, a vibrant central Navaratna Amethyst, and pearl drops accented with emerald beads. The peacock motifs showcase intricate filigree work. The pendant features a Hyderabadi polish, lending a rich, antique sheen.The pendant has the traditional 'kempu' stone arrangement.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Ideal for Muhurtham or Seemantham.
description: This handcrafted Haaram is a timeless investment, blending traditional South Indian aesthetics with a touch of contemporary elegance. The use of natural emeralds and freshwater pearls symbolizes prosperity and purity. The Mayura Padakam represents beauty and grace. Its versatile design makes it a cherished heirloom piece that can be passed down through generations. The Hyderabadi polish enhances its antique charm and value.
